frontmatter.title: Get started with Strawberry Shake and Blazor

items.title: Step 1: Add the Strawberry Shake CLI tools
Step 2: Create a Blazor WebAssembly project
Step 4: Add a GraphQL client to your project using the CLI tools
Step 5: Use the ConferenceClient to perform a simple fetch
Step 6: Using the built-in store with reactive APIs.

products.title: Hot Chocolate
products.description: Build your own thin GraphQL API layer on top of any resource.

products.title: Banana Cake Pop
products.description: Use this GUI to get deep insights from any GraphQL API.

products.title: Strawberry Shake
products.description: The only GraphQL client you will every need in the .NET ecosystem.

products.title: Green Donut
products.description: Configure data loaders and caching for GraphQL endpoints.
